text: Ekrem İmamoğlu (born 4 June 1970) is a Turkish politician. He is the Mayor of Istanbul since 27 June 2019. He was the mayor before from 17 April 2019 until 6 May 2019. He was elected in the March 2019 Istanbul mayoral election as the joint Nation Alliance candidate of the Republican People's Party (CHP) and the İYİ Party, then he was re-elected on 23 June 2019.Istanbul election rerun won by opposition, in blow to Erdogan He was formerly the Mayor of Beylikdüzü, a western district of Istanbul, between 2014 and 2019. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Istanbul Category:Turkish businesspeople
title: Ekrem İmamoğlu
